sense.gloss: to catch, to capture, to seize, to arrest, to grab, to catch hold of
to grasp (e.g. meaning), to perceive, to capture (e.g. features)

sdata.j: ↑早起↑↓はやお↓きの↑鳥↑↓とり↓は↑虫↑↓むし↓を|↑捕↑↓とら↓える|。
sdata.e: The early bird catches the worm.

sdata.j: ↑早起↑↓はやお↓きの↑鳥↑↓とり↓は↑虫↑↓むし↓を|↑捕↑↓とら↓える|。
sdata.e: The early bird gets the worm.
